name: When Push Comes To Shove
description:
A series of serial shovers delve together into a dangerous dungeon, but find themselves competing in minigame mayhem!

Four players need to push their way and compete for glory in a series of minigames in this couch co-op party game. In between each minigame, players chose a new modifier to be stacked onto their minigames, allowing for a unique experience nearly every playthrough!

MINIGAMES Tag Volley Bomb Dodgeball Hot Potato Soccer Sumo Chaotic Modifiers

Players encounter chaotic modifiers that will spice up each minigame! They can influence the chances of which modifier gets picked!

Hot Potato with Cluster Bombs modifier means more bombs!

You can now cross the middle line in Volley Bomb with the modifier Shovers Without Borders!

At the end, the player with the most points wins the game! Unedited Gameplay Footage
